game.name: Stickman Physics Battle Arena
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Level up and unlock the ultimate weapons in a bloody physics playground! You must kill countless enemies to increase your stats and become the greatest warrior. Dual wield over 75 unique and fun weapons in 7 different modes across nearly 100 different levels with up to 2 players in co-op or VS.
